message:
I love, love, love this one of a kind piece of art!!!üòç
There's clearly so much time and effort gone into each slice of wood. The overall effect, either with or without the little lights on is gorgeous. Thank you so much for prompt, free delivery too. It was really well packaged with some background information about where the wood came from, explaining it's unique origin and care guide.
Thanks again, Ruthüôè

Wow, what a beautiful one of a kind piece of wood/gonk. The flowers are so cute. It's even better than the photo. Thank you for the little note/drawing. It is very much appreciated. Will buy again, looking forward to new products.
